mapper.insert: INSERT INTO My_Order_Info(Order_Id, Order_Commodity_Liability1, Order_Commodity_Liability2, Order_Commodity_Liability3, Order_Commodity_Liability4, Order_Commodity_Liability5, Order_Commodity_Liability6, Order_Commodity_Liability7, Order_Beneficiary_Name, Order_Beneficiary_City, Order_Beneficiary_Phone, Order_Commodity_Time_Start, Order_Commodity_Time_End, Order_Commodity_Time_Length, Order_Sum_Price, O1, O2, O3) VALUE (#{orderId}, #{orderCommodityLiability1}, #{orderCommodityLiability2}, #{orderCommodityLiability3}, #{orderCommodityLiability4}, #{orderCommodityLiability5}, #{orderCommodityLiability6}, #{orderCommodityLiability7}, #{orderBeneficiaryName}, #{orderBeneficiaryCity}, #{orderBeneficiaryPhone}, #{orderCommodityTimeStart}, #{orderCommodityTimeEnd}, #{orderCommodityTimeLength}, #{orderSumPrice}, NULL, NULL, NULL);
